Original: 20240623_在西門町的紅樓旁,casa cafe  bar為我們提供了一個絕佳的 戶外聚會地點。夜晚的微風與悶熱 的氣溫形成鮮明對比,但這裡的氛 圍卻意外地令人放鬆。餐廳的氛圍活潑而又不失親切,服務人員的態度友好, 對於我們的需求反應迅速。即使在 最忙碌的時刻,他們也始終保持著 專業和耐心。
EN: 20240623_As next to the Red Mansion in Ximending, Casa Cafe Bar provides us with an excellent outdoor party place.The breeze at night is in sharp contrast to the bulky temperature, but the atmosphere here is unexpectedly relaxed.The atmosphere of the restaurant is lively without losing, and the attitude of service staff is friendly and responds rapidly to our demand.Even at the busiest moment, they always maintain professional and patience.
